instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3435 - long quarter fan spin and CPU Vcore pulses
threads.message:
hi 2informaticos

do you have clean me bios for this board, i couldn't find it anywhere else.

spi terminal resistors are all good.

The 25k MHz clock signal is there. 


hopefully isn't smc or CPU problem.

threads.title: 820-3435 - long quarter fan spin and CPU Vcore pulses
820-3435 - long quarter fan spin and CPU Vcore pulses
threads.message:
thank you [URL="https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/member/682-2informaticos"]2informaticos[/URL][B].  [/B]the board still doing the same problem

sometime will boot and most of the time doing long quarter fan spin and CPU Vcore pulses.

the board looks very clean. can it be bad SMC or CPU?

threads.title: 820-3435 - long quarter fan spin and CPU Vcore pulses
threads.message:
Run ASD EFI when possible.
Also try starting in SMC bypass mode.
If suspect liquid damage, reball SMC or reflow it at least.
